subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! 6 Arrested In Terror Plot In New Jersey
body:
The U.S. Attorney's Office says six people have been arrested in a plot to 
kill soldiers at Fort Dix in New Jersey.





Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
